### create variable to url

url_in <-"https://data.cityofnewyork.us/api/views/833y-fsy8/rows.csv?accessType=DOWNLOAD"

### Create variable to read csv file from url
nypd <- read_csv(url_in)

### rename nypd to df to save original nypd data in original state


### remove un needed columns
nypd <- subset(nypd, select = -c(X_COORD_CD, Y_COORD_CD, Latitude, Longitude, Lon_Lat))

### join time and date and save as datetime data type
nypd <- subset(nypd, select = -c(X_COORD_CD, Y_COORD_CD, Latitude, Longitude, Lon_Lat))

### remove columns from date and time
# Assuming dff is your data frame
nypd <- subset(nypd, select = -c(OCCUR_DATE, OCCUR_TIME))
